title: Commitment or Complacency? Terraform's Human-Centric Bet

stakeholderVoices.name: Operations & Finance Pressure
stakeholderVoices.quote: Internal push for stronger digital investment. Operations team reports inefficiencies compared to competitors using AI tools. Finance highlights margin pressure.

stakeholderVoices.name: Supplier Relations Update
stakeholderVoices.quote: Q1 renegotiations completed; 74% contracts secured at reduced volatility terms. Supplier satisfaction +12% YoY. Suppliers appreciate the relationship-first approach.

stakeholderVoices.name: Competitor Intelligence
stakeholderVoices.quote: Rumors: HexaBuild will release fully automated AI supply stack in Q3. This could give them significant competitive advantage in cost and speed.

stakeholderVoices.name: Board Expectations
stakeholderVoices.quote: Board wants clarity on long-term strategy. They're asking whether the human-centric approach can scale and remain competitive.

stakeholderVoices.name: Procurement Team Morale
stakeholderVoices.quote: Procurement team morale improved significantly. Team feels valued and reports better work-life balance without AI pressure.
